message_1: Calculate the enthalpy of vaporization for propane given its heat of fusion is 0.513 kJ/mol and heat of vaporization is 15.90 kJ/mol. The molar mass of propane is 44.10 g/mol.
message_2: The enthalpy of vaporization for propane is already given in the problem statement as 15.90 kJ/mol. There is no need for further calculation.
